channel.title: Omg! all java applets close out all windows!
channel.description: how come whenever i try to load a java applet, my firefox windows close? Do i need a new java plugin? if so can i have the link? or do i have a virus...?

item.title: Omg! all java applets close out all windows!
item.dc:creator: @teh_hacker teh_hacker
item.description:
@teh_hacker wrote:

the un-named, there is no message to ask if i want to run it

i click always a long time ago…

and it just randomly decides to close out all my firefox windows whenever a java applet loads, it’s realy gay

Read full topic
item.source: Omg! all java applets close out all windows!

item.title: Omg! all java applets close out all windows!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Are you just impatient and can’t wait for the message to ask you if you want to run it?
